title: One Veg World
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Chinese, Take-out, Asian, Catering
description: Vegan restaurant and teahouse located behind Edwards Cinema. Large menu features Asian rice, noodles, and vegetable dishes using mockmeats, in addition to veggie burgers, salads, and more. Casual and relaxing space with outdoor water fountain. Hosts all-you-can-eat buffet once a month. Formerly known as One World Vegetarian Cuisine.
